def_en: A speaker or writer uses yours to refer to something that belongs or relates to the person or people that they are talking or writing to.

def_cn: （用于书信结尾的签名前）你的/您的诚挚的/您的忠实的
def_en: People write yours ,yours sincerely, or yours faithfully at the end of a letter before they sign their name.  yours truly→see: truly;
